import * as d3 from 'd3' import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' function Radar(radarData) { const [SvgWeight, setSvgWeight] = useState() useEffect(() => { const cardio = radarData.radarData.data[0].value const energy = radarData.radarData.data[1].value const endurance = radarData.radarData.data[2].value const strength = radarData.radarData.data[3].value const speed = radarData.radarData.data[4].value const intensity = radarData.radarData.data[5].value const maxValue = [ cardio, energy, endurance, strength, speed, intensity, ].sort(function (a, b) { return b - a }) console.log(maxValue[0]) const cardioCoord = { axeX: 125 - Math.sin(Math.PI / 3) * radarData.radarData.data[0].value, axeY: 125 - Math.cos(Math.PI / 3) * radarData.radarData.data[0].value, } console.log(cardioCoord) const energyCoord = radarData.radarData.data[1].value const enduranceCoord = radarData.radarData.data[2].value const strengthCoord = radarData.radarData.data[3].value const speedCoord = radarData.radarData.data[4].value const intensityCoord = radarData.radarData.data[5].value const dPath = `M125 ${radarData.radarData.data[5].value} Z` const SvgWeightCreation = d3 .select('.radar-box') .attr('width', 250) .attr('height', 250) .style('background', '#000') .style('border-radius', '5px') setSvgWeight(SvgWeightCreation) }, []) return (
{console.log(radarData.radarData)}
) } export default Radar
